behaviour.feedbackOnWrong: Incorrect! The Fifth Conference on Machine Translation (WMT20) includes translation in Inuktitut and Tamil to and from English

l10n.a11yCheck: Check the answers. The responses will be marked as correct, incorrect, or unanswered.
l10n.a11yShowSolution: Show the solution. The task will be marked with its correct solution.
l10n.a11yRetry: Retry the task. Reset all responses and start the task over again.

question: The Fifth Conference on Machine Translation (WMT20) includes translation in Inuktitut and Tamil to and from English.
